problem_text_cn: 如图,已知圆锥的母线为10,底面圆的直径为12,则此圆锥的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the generatrix of the cone is N_0, and the diameter of the bottom circle is N_1, then the lateral area of ​​the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:底面圆的半径为6cm,则底面周长=12πcm,圆锥的侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×12π×10=60πcm^{2}．故选:D．
